item.title: TFS 129: Slowly Becoming Scott Adams
item.description: After the gang does a postmortem on The Shaniqua Mermaid, they delve into the capitalist world that seems to completely disregard profits and markets in favor of a political ideology, and how they have to cut corners to retain that.

item.title: Smoke Pit - Shooting the$h!t #10 My Other Rifle is a Pistol
Godcast Bonus Episode: A Lutheran Perspective on Mary
item.description:
In this episode, SuperLutheran lays out an explicitly Lutheran view of Mary, Mother of Jesus.

Are Jews the chosen people of God? No: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pzHB5Caglgo

Age of Ruin: From the Ashes: https://poa.st/@Godcast/posts/ALVRT05jJfK3me3PtY

The first of what I hope to be many entries in a science fiction universe both by and for /ourguys/.

Things we talked about during the show:

Mary: https://infogalactic.com/info/Mary_(mother_of_Jesus)

If you have questions about the Christian faith or just want to get in touch with us, we can be reached at TheGodcast@Protonmail.com

If you’d like to support the Godcast and/or The Very Lutheran Project, you can do so here: https://verylutheran.gumroad.com/

Myles and Super can be found improving timelines on the Fediverse here:

poa.st/@SuperLutheran

Pugnus Pastorem

item.title: HH64
item.description: episode 64

item.title: Rules of Britannia
item.description:
We are honored and saddened to finally release this Fourth Anniversary Full Haus, as our special guest was convicted on one charge and is currently in prison awaiting sentencing. Chris Cantwell joined us to break down this nightmare reality of state persecution of a family man who stood up to try to save his country. 

Please stay tuned for a fundraiser for Ash's wife and children.

Break: "Survival" by TesseracT

Close: "Terminator Theme" by Brad Fiedel

Charlottesville Torch March piece (aging well one month later)

Cantwell's Do Your Time

Listen to The Final Storm. Or else.

And HateHouse!

Go forth and multiply.

Support Full Haus here or at givesendgo.com/FullHaus 

Censorship-free Telegram commentary: https://t.me/prowhitefam2 

Telegram channel with ALL shows available for easy download: https://t.me/fullhausshows 

Gab.com/Fullhaus

Odysee for special occasion livestreams and back library in the process of being uploaded.

Full Haus syndicated on Amerikaner

RSS: https://fullhaus.libsyn.com/rss

All shows since Zencast (S) deplatforming: https://fullhaus.libsyn.com/

And of course, feel free to drop us a line with anything on your mind at fullhausshow@protonmail.com.

We love ya fam, and we’ll talk to you next week!

item.title: The Gamer Word Episode 28- Time for Total War
item.description: Bobby takes the reigns while Rolo and Ruckus are out carousing to bring in some special guests to discuss the Greenskins, the Skaven conspiracy, and how what is needed is Total War to bring about the Glory of Sigmar to the world.

item.title: Blood Tribe
item.description:
Gordon has an interview with Hammer, leader of the Blood Tribe, a group of outspoken National Socialists with an in-your-face and up front style, about his views, the recent successful protest that caused a child groomer in Ohio to run off scared, and the future of his organization.

This episode was released early to paying subscribers. If you would like to receive this early access, as well as other exclusive content, please visit Amerikaner.org/donate where you will find online payment options and our cryptocurrency wallets. For those who wish to use Crypto Currency, or our PO Box, we have a special members-only Telegram chat available upon request - just DM Gordon on Telegram (@GordonKahl). Our PO Box is:

PO Box 691
Brookings, SD 57006

Achtung! Amerikaner can be found at Amerikaner.org and ExodusAmericanus.com

item.title: TFS 128: 300 Visits To The Bath House
item.description: While the gang gears up for the next dylan mulvaney (The Little Mermaid), they reflect of the upcoming summer of flops and the bad marketing for all major products.

item.title: The Godcast, Episode 249: Mariology May with Louis Conde
item.description:
In this episode, SuperLutheran and Myles are joined by Louis Conde to discuss Mary, mother of Jesus. We discuss who she is, why she's special, and get into the details of Catholic Mariology. Louis sticks around to answer some emails in the second half.

Are Jews the chosen people of God? No: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pzHB5Caglgo

Age of Ruin: From the Ashes: https://poa.st/@Godcast/posts/ALVRT05jJfK3me3PtY

The first of what I hope to be many entries in a science fiction universe both by and for /ourguys/.

Things we talked about during the show:

Mary: https://infogalactic.com/info/Mary_(mother_of_Jesus)

Mary in the Catechism of the Catholic Church: https://marian.org/mary/in-the-catechism

If you have questions about the Christian faith or just want to get in touch with us, we can be reached at TheGodcast@Protonmail.com

If you’d like to support the Godcast and/or The Very Lutheran Project, you can do so here: https://verylutheran.gumroad.com/

Myles and Super can be found improving timelines on the Fediverse here:

item.title: Smoke Pit - Red Cell: Occido eos, Futuiso eos, Comedunto eos
item.description: The boys chat a bit about one of the most interesting ops in recent history, Red Cell, before devolving to complaining about the most loathed one, cooks. Fire up some mermite eggs and settle in for this episode of the Smoke Pit!Red Cell Documentary mentioned in the show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0NE3yWZaN28Feel free to hit up our email and telegram channel.TheSmokePit@protonmail.com or https://t.me/TheSmokePitRSS: https://audio.nobodyhasthe.biz/api/v1/channels/therealsmokepit/rss

item.title: Great Plains Active Club
item.description:
Gordon and Grug sit down with The Big N, one of the original members of the Great Plains Active Club, a fraternal organization for White Men in the Dakotas, Nebraska, Iowa, and Minnesota, dedicated to brotherhood, physical fitness, and self-improvement. They will discuss both past and current activities of the club, and its goals for the future.

If you would like to learn more about the club, please visit their telegram channel,
https://t.me/GreatPlainsActiveClub or join their telegram chat https://t.me/Great_Plains_Active_Club

The livestreams of our episodes are free to view, but the replay and the audio are made immediately available exclusively to Gumroad and Odysee subscribers, and then released for free at a later date. if you would like to receive this early content, as well as other exclusive content, please visit amerikaner.org/donate where you will find online payment options, cryptocurrency wallets, and our PO Box:

PO Box 691
Brookings, SD 57006

Achtung! Amerikaner can be found both at Amerikaner.org and ExodusAmericanus.com

item.title: TFS 127: The Opposite of a Scam
item.description: The gang does some quick reviews on 3 different products recently released (Peter Pan and Wendy, Guardians of the Galaxy 3 and Star Trek Picard Season 3) before breaking down some numbers for the upcoming live action flop little mermaid.

item.title: The American Freedom Party
item.description:
Gordon sits down with John Fassbinder of the American Freedom Party to discuss his organization's history, current activities, and future goals. We will discuss the difficulties associated with forming an alternative political party, and strategies that Mr. Fassbinder thinks will lead to the success of his organization.

This livestream will be free to view - the replay and audio will be made available to Gumroad and Odysee subscribers early. If you would like this early access, please visit Amerikaner.org/donate where you can subscribe for as little as $3/month. Please mail all correspondence to:

PO Box 691
Brookings, SD 57006

Achtung! Amerikaner can be found on both Amerikaner.org and ExodusAmericanus.com

item.title: Smoke Pit Shooting the $h!t #9 - Sucking Ass Wounds
item.description: The boys are back with another PSA regarding active shooter and general first aid and safety preparation for you and your loved ones. Check out our previous entry on this subject here for more advice along these lines. https://amerikaner.org/active-shooter-preparation-response/Feel free to hit up our email and telegram channel.TheSmokePit@protonmail.com or https://t.me/TheSmokePitRSS: https://audio.nobodyhasthe.biz/api/v1/channels/therealsmokepit/rss

item.title: The Gamer Word Episode 27- Beastly Transmissions
item.description: Rolo and Bobby speak about the problems brewing within the industry while Ruckus begins a downward spiral into a depression that will require another 2 weeks on an island with a farm girl named Ginger to get over as they look at the insidious and swift manner that unhealthy ideologies and lifestyles are being targeted at our children as one of the more popular (or to say, more astro turfed and pushed by the goblins) "gamers" out there has a cohost who has chosen to transform from a human to a Skeksis.

item.title: The Godcast, Episode 248: Reviewing "Return of the Gods"
item.description:
In this episode, SuperLutheran and Myles take a look at a lecture by Messianic Jew, Jonathan Cahn, where he lays out a case that several of the gods of the Old Testament have made a return, occupying the space that America has forced God out of. We answer your emails in the second half.

 

Are Jews the chosen people of God? No: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pzHB5Caglgo

Age of Ruin: From the Ashes: https://poa.st/@Godcast/posts/ALVRT05jJfK3me3PtY

The first of what I hope to be many entries in a science fiction universe both by and for /ourguys/.

 

Things we talked about during the show:

Return of the Gods by Jonathan Cahn: https://www.youtube.com/live/d7_GSDqc4TA?feature=share

 

If you have questions about the Christian faith or just want to get in touch with us, we can be reached at TheGodcast@Protonmail.com

If you’d like to support the Godcast and/or The Very Lutheran Project, you can do so here: https://verylutheran.gumroad.com/

Myles and Super can be found improving timelines on the Fediverse here:

poa.st/@Godcast

poa.st/@SuperLutheran

Pugnus Pastorem

Excalibur: https://infogalactic.com/info/Excalibur_(film)

item.title: Midwest News Roundup April 2023
item.description:
Gordon and Grug gather 'round the internet fire to regale you with news stories from all over the Midwest. The Minnesota government is openly protecting pedophiles, tradesmen in Ohio could potentially be making serious money - this roundup is a doozy.

This episode was livestreamed at Odysee.com/@Amerikaner and the replay and audio was made available to Gumroad Subscribers and Odysee Supporters early. If you would like to get episodes early and support our work, please visit Amerikaner.org/donate where you can subscribe for as little as $3 per month. Please send all correspondence to:

PO Box 691
Brookings, SD 57006

Stories Covered This Episode

  • Illinois: https://www.foxnews.com/politics/lori-lightfoot-pleads-with-gov-abbott-stop-sending-migrants-chicago-dangerous-inhumane
  • Indiana: https://ngo.locals.com/post/3856550/trans-therapist-charged-over-sexually-assaulting-autistic-children-in-indiana
  • Iowa: https://www.kcci.com/article/iowa-mother-that-stormed-the-capitol-receives-sentence/43754936
  • Kansas: https://kansasreflector.com/2023/04/26/kansas-house-overrides-governors-vetoes-of-three-anti-abortion-bills/
  • Michigan: https://breaking911.com/detroit-teacher-arrested-after-handgun-falls-out-of-knapsack-in-school-hallway/
  • Minnesota: https://www.lawofficer.com/minnesota-bill-would-protect-pedophiles-as-a-sexual-orientation/
  • Missouri: https://breaking911.com/a-78-year-old-woman-is-accused-of-robbing-a-missouri-bank-but-it-wasnt-her-first-time/
  • Nebraska: https://journalstar.com/news/local/car-aimed-for-nebraska-capitol-crashes-into-tree-instead-state-patrol-says/article_4fbb8850-e87b-11ed-9a65-2bc58153b6e3.html
  • North Dakota: https://bismarcktribune.com/news/state-and-regional/crime-and-courts/reduced-charge-for-man-who-allegedly-ran-over-north-dakota-teen/article_d857335d-ae35-53e8-b02c-0c37d4e13355.html
  • Ohio: https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/corporate-responsibility/intel-in-ohio.html
  • South Dakota: https://www.dakotanewsnow.com/2023/04/27/breaking-search-warrants-t-denny-sanford-child-porn-investigation-unsealed/
  • Wisconsin: https://apnews.com/article/wisconsin-underage-alcohol-servers-31e0c73786d5489c626250a279760420
  • Honorable Mention: https://www.theguardian.com/media/2023/may/01/vice-media-group-bankruptcy-report

Achtung! Amerikaner and many other fine podcasts can be found at both Amerikaner.org and ExodusAmericanus.com

item.title: Smoke Pit - Shooting the $h!t #8
item.description: Yes, you read that right...Feel free to hit up our email and telegram channel.TheSmokePit@protonmail.comhttps://t.me/TheSmokePitRSS: https://audio.nobodyhasthe.biz/api/v1/channels/therealsmokepit/rss

item.title: Unchained: Aryan Stallion 1488
item.description:
With our 4th anniversary special still embargoed but out any day now, we welcome the man, the myth, the legend - Aryan Stallion 1488 - to discuss a wild life from Afghanistan to Southeast Asia to the Pacific Northwest and the very real struggle to find and settle down with the right White woman. Parental advisory! The content gets definitively inappropriate for kids 30 minutes into the first hour.

Stick around for the second half as we question if we were better fathers to our earlier kids than our later ones, the Crowder footage, and the eternal question of where we should be settling down.

Break: "Eradicate" by Battlefront (DJ Sam)

Close: "Anvil of Crom" from Conan the Barbarian (DJ AS1488)

Follow our new pal: Telegram Odysee Gab Twitter and throw him some love at GiveSendGo too.

Christian Identity: Christogenea and TruthVids

Listen to The Final Storm. Or else.

We also recommend the Exit Podcast Episode 46: “How Did the Taliban Win?”

Go forth and multiply!

Support Full Haus here or at givesendgo.com/FullHaus 

Censorship-free Telegram commentary: https://t.me/prowhitefam2 

Telegram channel with ALL shows available for easy download: https://t.me/fullhausshows 

Gab.com/Fullhaus

Odysee for special occasion livestreams and back library in the process of being uploaded.

Full Haus syndicated on Amerikaner

RSS: https://fullhaus.libsyn.com/rss

All shows since Zencast (S) deplatforming: https://fullhaus.libsyn.com/

And of course, feel free to drop us a line with anything on your mind at fullhausshow@protonmail.com.

We love ya fam, and we’ll talk to you next week! No homo, no tranny.

item.title: The Gathering Of The Buffaloes
item.description:
Gordon and Grug sit down to discuss the most recent Amerikaner event, The Gathering Of The Buffaloes, in a blatant attempt to instill FOMO and to talk about upcoming plans for future events. With almost 60 attendees from all over the Midwest and the country, and members of various organizations including a good showing from the Great Plains Active Club, this event shows continued growth and a victory for a strategy of networking and cooperation.

If you would like to contact Gordon, email dakotafash@protonmail.com or send a message on telegram https://t.me/GordonKahl

If you would like to support our work, please visit amerikaner.org/donate where you can give a one-time donation, or subscribe for as little as $3/month. Address any correspondence to:

PO Box 691
Brookings, SD 57006

The livestream of this episode is free to view. The replay and the audio will be available early to Gumroad Subscribers and Odysee Supporters, and will be made available for free later.

item.title: The Gamer Word Episode 26- Return to Civilization
item.description: After taking a relaxing vacation on an unmarked island 200 miles south of Hawaii (where he had to give up on a crush he had on a young farm girl), Ruckus returns to find Bobby and some friends discussing the merits of Civilization: whether version 5 or 6 was better, if we should be hype or not about version 7 that may drop soon, and which cultures and methods of world conquest were/are the best and most based.

item.title: The Godcast, Episode 247: Panpsychism?
item.description:
In this episode, SuperLutheran and Myles discuss panpsychism, the idea that consciousness is an inherent property of matter. We answer your emails in the second half.

Are Jews the chosen people of God? No: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pzHB5Caglgo

Age of Ruin: From the Ashes: https://poa.st/@Godcast/posts/ALVRT05jJfK3me3PtY

The first of what I hope to be many entries in a science fiction universe both by and for /ourguys/.

 

Panpsychism: https://plato.stanford.edu/entries/panpsychism/

Several perspectives on panpsychism: https://youtu.be/B7KaNnFij2Q

Steven Furtick's coloring books: https://protestia.com/2022/02/17/never-forget-the-steven-furtick-coloring-book-all-the-pages-we-have-uncovered/

If you have questions about the Christian faith or just want to get in touch with us, we can be reached at TheGodcast@Protonmail.com

item.title: TFS 125: You're Out Of Touch
item.description: The system has lost control of the narrative and everything that it does shows why.

item.title: The Godcast, Episode 246: Escaping the Trans Cult, with Bane
item.description:
Apologies in advance for the less-than-stellar audio quality. I did what I could to clean it up.

 

In this episode, SuperLutheran and Myles are joined by listener Bane to discuss his experiences being in the cult of transgenderism. We hit emails as usual in the second half.

 

Are Jews the chosen people of God? No: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pzHB5Caglgo

item.title: For Your Situational Awareness (Explicit)
item.description:
Gordon and Rick (from "The Smoke Pit") have a conversation about the US Military, both at home and abroad. Rick gives his unique perspective and analysis thanks to his many years of service inside the institution, hoping to correct certain misconceptions and answer some often asked questions.

This production is released early for our Gumroad Subscribers and Odysee Supporters, and is released free to the public later. item.title: Midwest News Roundup March 2023
item.description:
Gordon and Grug cover news stories from every state in the Midwest - from "pastors" praising child-murdering transexuals to pajeets burning down pro-life organizations and getting caught from their spit on a burrito, we have every story you want to hear, and a few that you don't!

If you would like to support our work, please visit amerikaner.org/donate where you can subscribe for as little as $3 per month, or give a one-time donation (we also accept cryptocurrency). Please send all correspondence to:

PO Box 691
Brookings, SD 57006

Achtung! Amerikaner can be found at amerikaner.org, exodusamericanus.com, and odysee.com/@amerikaner. The episodes are released early for our Gumroad and Odysee supporters, and released later for free.

Stories Covered

  • Illinois: The Two Nigerians Jussie Smollet Hired For His Hate Hoax Do An Interview Explaining How It Went Down
  • Indiana: Indiana Woman Charged With Terrorism As Part Of Antifa Riot In Atlanta
  • Iowa: Iowa Governor Bans Child Transexual Surgery, Passes Bathroom Use Bill
  • Kansas: Kansas Passes Law, Legally Defines "Woman" As Biological Female
  • Michigan: Gov. Whitmer Signs Bill Expanding LGBTQ "Civil Rights" Protections
  • Minnesota: Minnesota Is Now A Genital Mutilation Sanctuary State, Wants To Be A Regular Sanctuary State As Well
  • Missouri: Will Families Flee Missouri If Health Care For "Trans Kids" Is Banned?
  • Nebraska: Multiple Nebraska Churches Vandalized In The Same Day
  • North Dakota: North Dakota "Pastor" Compares Transgender Nashville Child Murderer To Jesus Christ
  • Ohio: Mayor of Hudson Ohio Demands Teachers Resign Or Be Charged With Child Porn For Writing Prompts Including "Write A Sex Scene You Wouldn't Show Your Mom."
  • South Dakota: Noem Is Getting Catty With SD Legislators, Typical Woman Moment
  • Wisconsin: DNA From Half-Eaten Burrito Ties Pajeet To Firebombing Of Pro-Life Organization
  • Honorable Mention: Podcaster Murdered By Stalker At Washington Home (Video)

item.title: The Godcast, Episode 245: Christophany or Aligning to God's Will?
item.description:
In this week's episode, SuperLutheran and Myles have a discussion about God "changing His mind." Super presents a model of the apparent change being a Christophany while Myles presents a model of change being predicated on God's permissive will vs His stated will. We hit emails after the break.

Are Jews the chosen people of God? No: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pzHB5Caglgo

Age of Ruin: From the Ashes: https://poa.st/@Godcast/posts/ALVRT05jJfK3me3PtY

The first of what I hope to be many entries in a science fiction universe both by and for /ourguys/.

Things we talked about this episode:

Christophany: https://www.gotquestions.org/theophany-Christophany.html

Sovereign Will: https://www.gotquestions.org/Gods-will.html

Permissive Will: https://www.gotquestions.org/permissive-will.html

 

If you have questions about the Christian faith or just want to get in touch with us, we can be reached at TheGodcast@Protonmail.com

item.title: Landen Hoffmann
item.description:
Gordon and Grug do a break down of the story of Landen Hoffmann, a five year old White child who was thrown from a third-floor balcony at the Mall of America in 2019 by Emmanuel Deshawn Aranda, a black man with a known history of racially motivated violent crime. Four years later, Landen has seen a remarkable recovery after spending weeks in intensive care following extensive injuries.

The audio and video of Achtung! Amerikaner is made available to our Gumroad Subscribers and Odysee Supporters immediately upon release, and is released for free to the public later.

item.title: The Gamer Word Episode 24- The Alpha Diablo Worde
item.description: Join the men as they are regaled with the tale of Bobby as he established himself as the Alpha during the beta of what is (hopefully) not a mediocre sequel of one of the most foundational games of the generation. Meanwhile, Ruckus tells tales of a kids version of the game and how his children dragged him back to a game he swore to not play again. Most importantly, a question gets presented: Does booba = magical power?

item.description:
In this week's episode, SuperLutheran and Myles are joined by listener Charles to discuss a concept called Open Theism, or the notion that the future is, in some way, unknown by God. Emails as usual in the second half.

item.title: My Response To The Press
item.description:
In the last week, KDLT Dakota News Now, a local ABC and Fox News affiliate, released a story claiming to out me as the host of a "White Supremacist" podcast. The responses I have received directly from average South Dakotans in relation to the article have been universally positive - my only detractors in my home state appear to be mentally ill transsexuals and petty criminals, which is hardly surprising.

The full text of my response can be found here: https://amerikaner.org/?p=4023

item.title: S12E15: Our Lives, Crucified
item.description: Today's Daily Decade, for the Feast of St. Gabriel the Archangel, offers prayers for Austin and his family, who were in a car wreck on Christmas Eve, and he is currently wheelchair bound. We offer the prayers of the sick for his perfect healing and the care and health of his entire family. Today's reflection draws us near to a bit of mysticism, as we travel through the Seven Last Words of Christ from the Cross, and the persons each Word addresses and for whom each is spoken - from the crucifiers of Christ, which we all are in sin, to the repentant thief, whom we become in repentance, to the Blessed Mother and St. John, models for those whom we are called to become as Christians, to Christ Himself as we perfect our Christian lives. May these last two weeks of Lent be opportunity enough for us to discover who we are and where we stand in relation to the Crucified Christ.
item.dc:creator: Mario J. Goretti

item.title: National Divorce
item.description:
Gordon, Grug, and Fritz Hoss (of Ascending The Spectrum) discuss the recent flare up of liberal hand-wringing caused by comments from Marjorie Taylor Greene about a "National Divorce" - the separating of states based on how they vote. While seccession talk is always common, what is less common is the level of support - 20% of Americans, as of a recent poll. As the United States sees further decline, some form of balkanization seems inevitable - but will it really split along current political parties?

If you would like to support our work, please visit amerikaner.org/donate where you can subscribe for as little as $3 per month, or give a one-time donation. You can also do this on Odysee, by becoming an Odysee Supporter for $5 per month.

Brookings, SD 57006

A Case For Shutting The F*** Up
The Mandalorian: A Cautionary, Yet Hopeful Tale for the Children of Europe
TFS 123: Chicken in the Dishwasher
item.description: The whole gang is here as we discuss the internet just now noticing urban youths washing their chicken like they would wash a dish, the damage control at disney and the rejection of the little mermaid that can't even swim

item.title: S12E14: The Coronation of Man- and Womanhood
item.description: Today's Daily Decade, for the Feast of St. Katarina of Sweden, daughter of the famed St. Bridget of Sweden, offers prayers for the nation of Nigeria on behalf of a listener there. We beg the intercession of St. Frumentius [I accidentally said "St. Fulgentius", confusing the Apostle of the Ethiopians with the great hero of Ruspe in modern Tunisia - but the saint I was describing was the first preacher to bring the Faith south of the Sahara], and the many nameless martyr-saints Nigeria has collected over the years, for the total conversion of the country, the defeat of the Saracen who kidnap and corrupt their children, and the purification of the darkened hearts of any and all pagans who continue to exercise power over Christians. Today's reflection considers the Crowning of the Blessed Virgin Mary, and the model she provides as a mother to all women as well as the role she plays as Patron Saint of all Christians, pointing the way to the ideal manhood, whose core vocation is authority, and the ideal womanhood, whose core vocation is maternity.
item.dc:creator: Mario J. Goretti

item.title: S12E13: Finding Jesus and Seeking God's Will
item.description: Today's Daily Decade, for the Feast of St. Benedict, offers prayers for the end of Infanticide in the Western world and for God's Justice upon those who facilitate it, aid and abet its proponents, and all of us who tolerate it passively. We beg the intercession of the Blessed Virgin Mary and St. Joseph, chiefly responsible as they are for begging mercy for poor sinners. Today's reflection opens with this very subject, the disavowal of responsibility, contrasted with the way in which the Blessed Mother, herself blameless by nature, sought her Son "sorrowing" - sorrowing for His loss, but not bewailing her suffering for her own sake. How often do we ask "why?" when we mean "why me?", instead of asking God to reveal His design so we can better conform ourselves to it?
item.dc:creator: Mario J. Goretti

item.title: Bound by Blood feat. Hammer
item.description:
The preternatural provocateur and chief erythrocyte of the Blood Tribe - Hammer - joins us this week for a long overdue interview about his background, fire for activism, and everything else in the struggle.

The bald berserker hangs out through the second half as well to talk health and fitness, Trump 2024, and lots more.

Bumper: Prodigy

Break: Svanrand by Heilung

Close: Heileger Krieg - "What Have We Done?"

item.title: The Gamer Word Episode 23- Furtado Feminism
item.description: Ruckus and Bobby come together to agree that it is time to smash the patriarchy and play a game with the strongest and most believable female role out there. Even better, she is not oversexualized nor does she fit into any of those tropes that fake games journalists like to complain about.Listen as they discuss how this character is truly the best strong and independent female you can play a game as and it is truly the most feminist game out there. And be sure to share their ideas for a sequel with the developer: including another strong female role and ensuring that true diversity is shown in the sequel (there were far too many White people in this game to match real life).

item.title: The Godcast, Episode 243: The Jesus Movement
item.description:
In this week's episode, SuperLutheran and Myles discuss the Jesus Movement of the 60's and 70's. We talk about what it was, its lasting impact, key figures within the movement, and we touch briefly on a new film called The Jesus Revolution about the Movement. Emails as usual in the second half.

Are Jews the chosen people of God? No: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pzHB5Caglgo

Age of Ruin: From the Ashes: https://poa.st/@Godcast/posts/ALVRT05jJfK3me3PtY

The first of what I hope to be many entries in a science fiction universe both by and for /ourguys/.

The Jesus Movement: https://infogalactic.com/info/Jesus_movement

The Jesus Revolution (2023 film): https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jesus_Revolution

Greg Laurie: https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greg_Laurie

Lonnie Frisbee: https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lonnie_Frisbee

GotQuestions's take on the above: https://www.gotquestions.org/Jesus-Movement.html

A vanishingly rare good article from The Christian Post about why people like The Jesus Revolution: https://www.christianpost.com/voices/the-real-reason-why-people-like-jesus-revolution.html

item.title: S12E12: The Sorrow and Joy of the Cross
item.description: Today's Daily Decade, for the Feast of St. Patrick of Ireland, offers prayers for the perfect healing and fully recovery of the father of listener VAL. We offer the Latin prayers for the sick from the Sacrament of Extreme Unction. Today's reflection is on the joy and hope of the Way of the Cross, considering the Saints that were sanctified by their witness and participation in the crucifixion, from St. Longinus who helped to crucify Our Lord to St. Simon of Cyrene who aided Him reluctantly, to St. Veronica who risked her life to give Him comfort.
item.dc:creator: Mario J. Goretti

item.title: Rose City Nationalist Club
item.description:
Gordon sits down for an interview with Alfred, founder and leader of Rose City Nationalist Club and co-founder of Northwest Nationalist Network, a fraternal organization for Nationalists in the Pacific Northwest and Portland, Oregon. They talk about the RCNC's recent activities and cooperation with other groups in their region, the city of Portland, and the future of the movement.

Rose City Nationalist Club Contact Info

  • Telegram: https://t.me/rosecitync
  • E-Mail: rosecitync@proton.me
  • Gab: http://gab.com/rosecitynationalists
  • Twitter: https://twitter.com/rosecitync2

If you would like to support Amerikaner.org please visit Amerikaner.org/donate for online payment options, including a subscription for as little as $3 per month and Crypto Currency options. Please mail all correspondence to:

PO Box 691
Brookings, SD 57006

item.title: S12E11: The Assumption, and the Joy of All Who Sorrow
item.description: Today's Daily Decade, for the Feast of Pope St. Zachary I, offers prayers for Melanie, a friend of listener Kevin. We beg the intercession of St. Elizabeth of Hungary, an exemplary woman who faced many kinds of trials and took divers and sundry opportunities to manifest holiness, for the general welfare of Melanie and the grace of God upon her and those responsible for her well-being. Today's reflection continues our theme of divine joy in the midst of human sorrow, the meaning of sorrow, compassion, and pain in our fallen world, and the example of the Assumption to help us pierce the veil of human sorrow to find joy wherever God is glorified. I have to admit I missed a spectacular opportunity to make reference to the icon Joy of All Who Sorrow and examine why Our Lady is given that title by Slavic Christians. Perhaps we'll revisit it in the future!
item.dc:creator: Mario J. Goretti

Returning expert Midgardener covers the plants, first-timer Hans covers animal husbandry, and the Birth Panel carries the rest with NWL, great audience feedback, and discussions on melatonin and the HPV vaccine in the second hour.

Rolo recommends GABA as a sleep aid.

item.title: The Gamer Word Episode 22- Thot Simulator with Goats
item.description: The men come together to discuss one of the best physics simulator games, and how Twitch went quickly from a gaming community to fake and gay political gatekeeping site. Rolo and Bobby talk in depth about how Destiny became what he is and Ruckus learns to tie a noose while looking at a Twitch thot playing the forbidden game.

item.title: S12E10: Sorrow, Joy, and Purification
item.description:
Today's Daily Decade, for the Feast of St. Euphrasia, offers prayers for the young lady hosting the Alithea Xeniplothike channel on Telegram, that she might discern her vocation clearly and faithfully. We beg the intercession of Ss. Benedict and Scholastica, two great monastics who, though brother and sister, were called separately by God to live a life pleasing to Him in a monastery. Today's reflection turns to the Blessed Mother and Holy Simeon in the Temple, and the way sorrow of this world mingles with joy - particularly, how this should motivate us to seek the unalloyed joy of Heaven, our native home, the way a feeling of nostalgia draws us back to that which is good but no longer with us, we must have a nostalgia for God - longing to be with Him, knowing we can never truly be perfectly with Him as long as we are here. 

Advisory: I had to use a different pair of headphones to record, so the background noise is a little worse than usual. Long-time listeners will remember when every episode sounded like this, speaking of nostalgia! We'll be back to normal Wednesday.
item.dc:creator: Mario J. Goretti

item.title: The Godcast, Episode 242: The Miracle at Fatima
item.description:
In this week's episode, SuperLutheran is joined by fediverse gadfly, Louis Conde to discuss the Marian apparition at Fatima, Portugal. Myles jumps in with Super and Louis in the second half for emails.

item.title: S12E9: The Authority of the Crown of Thorns
item.description: Today's Daily Decade, for the Feast of the Forty Holy Martyrs of Sebaste, offers prayers for Stefaniya's father, his full recovery and perfect healing. We offer the prayers of the sick, for recovery of bodily health, from the end of the Rite of Extreme Unction. Today's reflection is two-pronged, discussing both the authority found in the Crown of Thorns as well as the example Christ sets for us to imitate in our own pursuit of Salvation, the meaning of which is only available to us because of the descent of God to us, first as the Messias and then as the Holy Ghost who makes the meaning of Our Lord's teachings clear to us, and His way is simple: putting aside ourselves.
item.dc:creator: Mario J. Goretti

item.title: HateHouse EP 58 (Bobby Bacala and I)
item.description: EP 58 of the show in stream form

item.title: TFS 122: Marape Shoes
item.description: The gang is all here as we wander from our regular scheduled deprogramming into numale science about fake sweeteners, when you shouldn't have babies, and papa new guinea. As always, entertaining results.
